faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to your questions
faq.question1: Can you really deliver a landing page in 3 days?
faq.answer1: Yes, our process is optimized to deliver a finished product within 72 hours from project approval. To achieve this, we work with strict deadlines and a team dedicated exclusively to your project.
faq.question2: What exactly is included in the $1,000 USD price?
faq.answer2: The price includes custom design, frontend development, contact form, hosting for one year, mobile optimization, basic SEO, and delivery of the complete source code.
faq.question3: Can I request changes after delivery?
faq.answer3: Yes, we include one round of revisions at no additional cost. Major changes or those outside the initial scope may have an additional cost that will be quoted in advance.
faq.answer4: We request a 50% deposit to start the project and the remaining 50% upon completion, before the final delivery of the code and publication.
faq.question5: Do you provide maintenance after delivery?
faq.answer5: Hosting is included for one year, but maintenance and updates are handled separately. We can offer you a maintenance plan tailored to your needs.
faq.question6: Can you integrate payment systems or online stores?
faq.answer6: Basic landing pages are focused on conversion and lead generation. For payment integrations or complete stores, we recommend our complete web development services, which we quote separately.
